EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Oklahoma EFT template
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBSOK EFT Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Case.Name_Submitter__c)),Case.Name_Submitter__c, Case.Account_Name_for_Email_Templates__c)},

Your request to be listed on our file as a Non-Participating Provider has been completed. To sign up for EFT/ERA you must be a registered Availity® Provider Portal user – there is no cost to register at availity.com If you have questions or inquiries, please contact us at oknetworkmanagement@bcbsok.com. We look forward to serving you. Sincerely, Health Care Delivery – Provider Network For Internal Purpose only. (NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.EmailThread_On_Child__c}
